name: Tera Blast
description: You unleash the power of your tera type as a focused beam of elemental energy. Make a ranged attack against a creature, doing 2d6 + MOVE damage on hit. If you are terastallized, the type of this damage is the same as your tera type. Otherwise, it is normal.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
